name: MSC Game
description:
Hello everybody! 

I am glad to welcome you on the page of this game.  You don't need to download anything.  Just click the "Play" button to launch the game. 

Changelog:

  • Added two more levels.
  • Rearranged levels' order according to the added lore of the game
  • New mechanics such as flying on a spaceship and a healthbar
  • Locations are now decorated 
  • New mob - Ghost
  • Soundtrack that matches the vibe of the story

Try to complete all the levels and help the Brave Shiba find the last crystal!
Full screen recommended.

Game was made by cupare.e#8050
